# WalkonManager v1.0.0
Why would you have a walk-on action for every user? Just have a folder with .mp3s titled with the username it applies to!

Triggered with chat first words: https://docs.streamer.bot/api/triggers/twitch/chat/first-words

# How to implement?
Use the import below, and set the folder path in the walkon_folder argument in the action. There's no C# code for this currently, it's all just Streamer.bot stuff.

## Streamer.bot Import
